18 Oct 2013

You'll find this post in your _posts directory - edit this post and re-build (or run with the -w switch) to see your changes! To add new posts, simply add a file in the _posts directory that follows the convention: YYYY-MM-DD-name-of-post.ext.

Jekyll also offers powerful support for code snippets:

def print_hi(name)
  puts "Hi, #{name}"
end
print_hi('Tom')
#=> prints 'Hi, Tom' to STDOUT.

Check out the Jekyll docs for more info on how to get the most out of Jekyll. File all bugs/feature requests at Jekyll's GitHub repo.

Who We Are

We are more than a group of passionate web professionals. We are unique. We focus on delivering solutions that are as simple as they can be and no simpler. Thatâ€™s the balance. Yes, we can do bells and whistles but thatâ€™s not the aim. We focus on the things that keep customers coming back time and time again.

Our Creative Process

  • DEFINE

    Define the specific problem you want to solve

  • DESIGN

    Design the solution that solves the problem

  • REFINE

    Improve on it and get it right problem

  • CREATE

    Build the solution and make it shine
